rev.desc.rev.desc: add path to add text mode formats when doing a copy in gui mode. before would only make gui forms. select.join is now a decision panel that checks to see if we are in gui and if we are then copy the text mode forms too. after text mode forms are done (select.join.txt) then go to normal adding of gui forms (select.join.gui)
Modified code to associate the join/attribute formats with their respective files.
Added process panel to populate the attr.file and joinfile fields in the devtype record prior to adding to the database and after forms are created.
Modified display panel to set "back" exit to $CANCEL.
Corrected queries on delete.join.fmt and delete.attr.fmt panels.
Added format parameter value on calls to icm.copy.file.
When a given format is unavailable for copying, a message box appears prompting users to create the new devtype format from scratch
Shouldn't pass the variable in. It confuses the C code.
Modified panels build.attr.file.1 and build.join.file.2 to call icm.copy.file.

descript.descript: add path to add text mode formats when doing a copy in gui mode. before would only make gui forms. select.join is now a decision panel that checks to see if we are in gui and if we are then copy the text mode forms too. after text mode forms are done (select.join.txt) then go to normal adding of gui forms (select.join.gui)
Modified code to associate the join/attribute formats with their respective files.
Added process panel to populate the attr.file and joinfile fields in the devtype record prior to adding to the database and after forms are created.
Modified display panel to set "back" exit to $CANCEL.
Correct queries on delete.join.fmt and delete.attr.fmt panels.
Added format parameter value on calls to icm.copy.file.
When a given format is unavailable for copying, a message box appears prompting users to create the new devtype format from scratch
SHouldn't pass the variable in. It confuses the C code.
Modified panels build.attr.file.1 and build.join.file.2 to call icm.copy.file.
